body_html:
TensorFlow officially supports NVIDIA GPU. For using AMD gpu you have to compile TensorFlow using OpenCL. Please read this setup guide to get more insights on TensorFlow AMD Setup.

Actually I have a NVIDIA GPU but it is cuda compute capability 3.0 GPU but tensorflow gpu support 3.5. So I was looking for a workaround.
body_text:
TensorFlow officially supports NVIDIA GPU. For using AMD gpu you have to compile TensorFlow using OpenCL. Please read this setup guide to get more insights on TensorFlow AMD Setup.

Actually I have a NVIDIA GPU but it is cuda compute capability 3.0 GPU but tensorflow gpu support 3.5. So I was looking for a workaround.
body:
> TensorFlow officially supports NVIDIA GPU. For using AMD gpu you have to compile TensorFlow using OpenCL. Please read this [setup guide](https://developer.codeplay.com/computecppce/latest/getting-started-with-tensorflow) to get more insights on TensorFlow AMD Setup.

Actually I have a NVIDIA GPU but it is cuda compute capability 3.0 GPU but tensorflow gpu support 3.5. So I was looking for a workaround.
